subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: This will be only the fourth season in the last 12 in which the Mets were five games over .500 after their final game with the Yankees, but Terry Collins’s attitude is producing positive results.
snippet: This will be only the fourth season in the last 12 in which the Mets were five games over .500 after their final game with the Yankees, but Terry Collins’s attitude is producing positive results.
